cab.content: /V1SECRET.E.L.S. 1553PARIS. 31st December, 1917.NOTE FROM COLONEL SPIERS FOR COLONEL FAGALDE.RUSSIA.Reference my E.L.S, 977 and E.L.S. 1032.From" General Berthelot, December 30th:One Brigade of the Serbian Division for Salonika was unable to embark with the rest, and remained at Kalouga where It still is. Its morale is now in a deplorable state.It would be desirable to withdraw it-from the environment of Maximalist anarchy, to the back of the Roumanian front, where it could be usefully employed in maintaining order on the Bessarabian railways.
